Package co.edu.icesi.nextfruit.modules.model

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CameraCalibration
    This class contains the calibration information associated with a camera, and is loaded from an XML file containing said information.
    CameraSettings
    This class is used to wrap the translation matrix and white values to convert colors between rgb and xyz space
    ColorDistribution
    This class is used to wrap in xyY (double[]) color into a java.awt.Color.
    MatchingColor
    This class extends from ColorDistribution and is used to initialize one instance of it using a xyY color.
    MatchingColorGroup  
    MatchingColorInterpreter
    This class reads a matching color structure from a text
    PolygonIterator
    This object is used to iterate over all the containing points inside a polygon.
    PolygonWrapper
    This class wraps a list of Point objects that form a polygon.
